translations.An error has occured in this applciation: An error has occured in this applciation. Please report this error with as much details as possible here: https://github.com/NeoCoderMatrix86/AudioCuesheetEditor/issues/new?assignees=&labels=unreviewed+bug&template=bug_report.md&title=. Afterwards you can reload the application.
translations.Please check processinghints for errors,: Please check processing hints for errors. Otherwise the file is not exportable.
translations.Do you really want to reset the cuesheet: Do you really want to reset the cuesheet? This can not be reversed.
translations.Do you really want to delete all tracks?: Do you really want to delete all tracks? This can not be reversed.
translations.Confirm restart of application. All unsa: Please confirm, that you want to restart the whole application. All data will be lost if not saved before!
translations.Confirm reset of application. All unsave: Please confirm, that you want to reset the whole application. All data will be reset and the application will be reloaded. Every unchanged data will be lost!
